UpdateSourceArgs: -c "BepInExBuildNumber=\"{{BepInExBuildNumber}}\" && if [[ -z \"$BepInExBuildNumber\" ]]; then BepInExBuildNumber=733; fi && if [[ ! \"$BepInExBuildNumber\" =~ ^[0-9]+$ ]]; then echo \"Invalid BepInEx build number specified\" && exit 1; fi && wget -qO BepInEx.zip https://builds.bepinex.dev/projects/bepinex_be/$BepInExBuildNumber/BepInEx-Unity.IL2CPP-linux-x64-6.0.0-be.$BepInExBuildNumber%2B*.zip && echo \"BepInEx IL2CPP Linux x64 bleeding edge build $BepInExBuildNumber downloaded\""
